Posts.Content: Feb 6, 2012 07:34AM livinupnorth wrote: I hit the wall after my 4th round of chemo. I was ready to quit right there on the spot. It took me a good week to bounce back from my funk. I decided that no matter how much i dreaded round 5, I needed to hit it hard and get it over with rather than take a break and anticipate having to start again. 5 days into round 5 I feel like a could hit that wall again....it definately a constant mental challenge and only you can decide how much you can bear. Goood luck and remember whatever you choose to do It's Ok!
Posts.Title: Need a break from chemo! victorious2012 victorious2012
